titleStmt.title: An account of the late revolution in New-England together with the declaration of the gentlemen, merchants, and inhabitants of Boston and the country adjacent : April 18, 1689 / written by Mr. Nathanael Byfield ...
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nathanael, 1653-1733.

notesStmt.note: The letter is dated: Bristol [R. I.] April 29, 1689. The accompanying Declaration (p. 7-19) was first printed at Boston by Samuel Green a few days subsequent to the 18th of April. Cf. Byfield, p. 19, and The Andros tracts, Boston, 1868, v. 1, p. 11.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
